outpost.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a group of buildings in a place far from cities or towns, usually established as a military camp or a place for trade
outpost.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a remote outpost of the empire
outpost.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a shop, office etc in a particular area that is part of a large organization
outpost.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The company has outposts all over the world.
